EXTRACTED VALUE: The driving is an excellent blend of high-speed antics and risk, as one crash can quickly end your run.
A must for car-loving 360 owners. [Aug 2007, p.80]
Project Gotham Racing 4 feels like an update to Project Gotham Racing 3 more so than a full-fledged sequel.
All in all, skate is just too different and will have a rough time converting even the most rabid fan of skating games.
The visuals play more of an important role than just eye-candy.
